name: Marshall Junction Partners
tag_list: gregg-alwine, david-barnett, corsis, corsis-llc, promotions-com, sockwa, private-equity-firm, venture-incubator
overview:
Marshall Junction Partners is passionate about creating real, valuable businesses.

Marshall Junction Partners LLC is a private equity firm and venture incubator, specializing in building and supporting businesses that solve critical marketplace needs. The firm seeks to develop those businesses to a point where they are suitable for acquisition by leading corporations within their industries.

Marshall Junction Partners brings a unique philosophy, diverse experience, and a dynamic blend of strategic, financial, and operational capabilities to each of our companies – a combination that facilitates ideas and is proven to create real, valuable businesses.

Led by a pair of seasoned executives, Gregg Alwine and David Barnett, the Marshall Junction Partners team is comprised of committed professionals with a diverse set of knowledge spanning all aspects of the corporate life-cycle.

The firm’s portfolio consists of a limited number of companies that meet our investment philosophy. The following companies represent active entities under Marshall Junction’s leadership.

  • Corsis LLC: Corsis is an IT infrastructure management firm that helps companies mitigate data center risk and reduce costs on the cloud. For more information, please visit www.corsis.com.

  • Promotions.com: Promotions.com is a leading provider of sweepstakes, contests, instant-win games and other consumer-activation tactics. They live by their “Smarter Promotions” philosophy, and incorporate the theme throughout everything they do. For more information, please visit www.promotions.com.

  • Sockwa: Sockwa is a brand that provides innovative footwear for people who’d rather go barefoot. For more information, please visit www.sockwa.com.
